Address.value: 4 IRVING PLACE,ROOM 700, NEW YORK, New York, 10003, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Con Ed is a holding company for Consolidated Edison of New York, or CECONY, and Orange & Rockland, or O&R. These utilities provide steam, natural gas, and electricity to customers in southeastern New York-including New York City-and small parts of New Jersey. The two utilities generate roughly 90% of Con Ed's earnings. The other 10% of earnings comes from investments in renewable energy projects and gas and electric transmission.
